title: Follow the Cup

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "it’s under there!" on the other.
• Put 4 cups upside down in a row on a surface where the switch user can see them.
• Put a chocolate coin (or other treat) under one of the cups and mix them up.
• The switch user must help locate which cup the coin is under.
• Point to the first cup in the line, if the switch chooses "next" point to the next cup.
• If they choose "it’s under there!" lift the cup.
• The switch user gets to eat the chocolate coin if they can find it!

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through cups to find the hidden chocolate coin!
